D.title: Block Light Absorption 1.10.0
D.description: The amount of light this block will absorb.

E.title: Block Light Emission 1.10.0
E.description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

F.title: Break On Push 1.10.0
F.description: When pushed by a piston the block breaks.

G.title: Breathability 1.10.0
G.description: Property describing the breathability of this block and whether it is treated as a solid or as air.

H.title: Destroy Time 1.10.0
H.description: Sets the destroy time property for the block. Greater numbers result in greater mining times. Time is measured in seconds with base equipment.

I.title: Display Name 1.10.0
I.description: Specifies the language file key that maps to what text will be displayed when you hover over the block.

J.title: Entity Collision 1.10.0
J.description: Can only be set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component

BA.title: Explosion Resistance 1.10.0
BA.description: Sets the explosion resistance for this block.

BB.title: Flammable 1.10.0
BB.description: Describes the flammable properties for this block.

burn_odds.description: How likely the block will be destroyed by flames when on fire. Value must be greater than or equal to 0.
burn_odds.title: Burn Odds

flame_odds.description: How likely the block will catch flame when next to a fire. Value must be greater than or equal to 0.
flame_odds.title: Flame Odds

BC.title: Friction 1.10.0
BC.description: Property describing the friction for this block. Friction effects an entities movements when it walks on the block.

BD.title: Geometry 1.10.0
BD.description: The geometry description identifier to use, this identifier must match an existing geometry identifier in any of the currently loaded resource packs.

BE.title: Immovable 1.10.0
BE.description: An Immovable block cannot be pushed by pistons

BF.title: Loot 1.10.0
BF.description: The path of the loot table that this component will use when the block is destroyed.

BG.title: Map Color 1.10.0
BG.description: A color represented as a hex value. This will be the color rendered to a map.

BH.title: Material Instances 1.10.0
BH.description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

BI.title: Only Piston Push 1.10.0
BI.description: Blocks with those components won't stick to stickyPistons

BJ.title: Pick Collision 1.10.0
BJ.description: Can only be set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities

format_version.title: 1.16.200 Format Version
format_version.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

identifier.description: The identifier for this block. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla block.
identifier.title: Identifier

is_experimental.description: If this block is experimental, it will only be registered if the world is marked as experimantal.
is_experimental.title: Is Experimental

register_to_creative_menu.description: Whether or not to register this block to the creative inventory menu.
register_to_creative_menu.title: Register To Creative Menu

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: UNDOCUMENTED

BCI.title: Block Light Absorption 1.17.0
BCI.description: The amount of light this block will absorb.

BCJ.title: Block Light Emission 1.17.0
BCJ.description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

BDA.title: Break On Push 1.17.0
BDA.description: When pushed by a piston the block breaks.

BDB.title: Breathability 1.17.0
BDB.description: Property describing the breathability of the block, and whether it's treated as a solid block or a block of air

BDC.title: Creative Category 1.17.0
BDC.description: Specifies the creative group for the block.

BDD.title: Destroy Time 1.17.0
BDD.description: Sets the destroy time property for the block. Greater numbers result in greater mining times. Time is measured in seconds with base equipment.

BDE.title: Display Name 1.17.0
BDE.description: Specifies the language file key that maps to what text will be displayed when you hover over the block.

BDF.title: Entity Collision 1.17.0
BDF.description: Can only be set to false or an object, it disables the collision of the block with entities.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component

BDG.title: Explosion Resistance 1.17.0
BDG.description: Sets the explosion resistance for this block.

BDH.title: Flammable 1.17.0
BDH.description: Describes the flammable properties for this block.

burn_odds.description: How likely the block will be destroyed by flames when on fire. Value must be greater than or equal to 0.
burn_odds.title: Burn Odds

flame_odds.description: How likely the block will catch flame when next to a fire. Value must be greater than or equal to 0.
flame_odds.title: Flame Odds

BDI.title: Friction 1.17.0
BDI.description: Property describing the friction for this block. Friction effects an entities movements when it walks on the block.

BDJ.title: Geometry 1.17.0
BDJ.description: The geometry description identifier to use, this identifier must match an existing geometry identifier in any of the currently loaded resource packs.

BEA.title: Immovable 1.17.0
BEA.description: An Immovable block cannot be pushed by pistons

BEB.title: Loot 1.17.0
BEB.description: The path to the loot table, relative to the behavior pack.

BEC.title: Map Color 1.17.0
BEC.description: A color represented as a hex value. This will be the color rendered to a map.

BED.title: Material Instances 1.17.0
BED.description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

BEE.title: Only Piston Push 1.17.0
BEE.description: Blocks with those components won't stick to stickyPistons

BEF.title: Part Visibility 1.17.0
BEF.description: Maps bone names in a geometry file to a condition that turns their rendering on/off. The condition should be a Molang query that uses block properties to determine true/falseSupported queries include 'has_block_property', 'block_property', and other queries that can evaluate without knowledge of the block's in-game positional or player affected data.

BFE.title: Placement Filter 1.17.0
BFE.description: Sets rules for under what conditions the block can be placed/survive

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: List of conditions where the block can be placed/survive

allowed_faces.title: Allowed Faces
allowed_faces.description: List of any of the following strings: up, down, north, south, east, west, side, all

block_filter.title: Block Filter
block_filter.description: List of blocks (can use tags to specify them) that this block can be placed against in the allowed_faces direction

BFF.title: Prevents Jumping 1.17.0
BFF.description: This component makes it so actors can't jump when walking on this block

BFG.title: Random Ticking 1.17.0
BFG.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values

on_tick.title: On Tick
on_tick.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values

BFH.title: Rotation 1.17.0
BFH.description: This is the block's rotation around the center of the cube in degrees. The rotation order is x-y-z.

BFJ.title: Unit Cube 1.17.0
BFJ.description: Specifies that a unit cube is to be used with tessellation.

BGA.title: Unwalkable 1.17.0
BGA.description: Sets the block as unwalkable. Mobs would not attempt to path over top of it when the value is set to true.
